ISSUE.TITLE: Do not hard-code an invoice filename
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: OrderController => GetPdfInvoice => Change Pdf File Name, on line 203 (for V4.50), the file name is "order..." but the controller return an invoice. In France this is not the right name, it should be "Facture" (Invoice). Yes, France is a pain with the official documents that must be in French, including the name. It would be nice to put this label in the resource table "LocaleStringResource" so that each language can have the correct document name. We already implemented https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/5138. So let's implement the same for OrderController => GetPdfInvoice => Change Pdf File Name Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/96757/ordercontroller-getpdfinvoice-change-pdf-file-name

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6679 Add resource PDFInvoice.FileName in file name of invoice
